str2: Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.
Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.
